```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r load packages, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)
library(raster)
```

##  Tryout

```{r st_read, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

wards <- st_read("wards_precincts.geojson")
neighborhoods <- st_read("BOUNDARY_CDDNeighborhoods.shp.zip")

```

## Including Plots

```{r cambridge_plot test, echo=FALSE}

cambridge_plot <- ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = wards, color = "blue") +
  geom_sf(data = neighborhoods, color = "green", alpha = 0.5)
  

```

```{r maptest, echo=FALSE}

ggplot() +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none", type = "stamenbw") +
  geom_sf(data = wards, color = "blue", alpha = 0.05) +
  geom_sf(data = neighborhoods, color = "green", alpha = 0.05) +
  labs(caption = "Map tiles by Stamen Design. Data by OpenStreetMap")

```
